Measurements (mm). Length of body: male 46.7–54.6, female 44.9–51; pronotum: male 18.4–21, female 14.1–15.8; hind femur: male 18.5–23, female 19–21.1; ovipositor: 11.7–14.8 ( Ünal 2011 ).
For some hybrid forms see the remarks section of the next species.
This species has not been assessed for the IUCN Red List (2016–3). It has enough populations and distribution. It should be in “Least Concern” status in the IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
